Body:
sampling_rate = 1000
noise = 0.15
ecg = nk.ecg_simulate(duration=120, sampling_rate=sampling_rate, noise=
    noise, random_state=42)
ecg_cleaned_nk = nk.ecg_clean(ecg, sampling_rate=sampling_rate, method=
    'neurokit')
signals, info = nk.ecg_peaks(ecg_cleaned_nk, correct_artifacts=False,
    method='neurokit')
assert signals.shape == (120000, 1)
assert np.allclose(signals['ECG_R_Peaks'].values.sum(dtype=np.int64), 139,
    atol=1)
signals, info = nk.ecg_peaks(ecg_cleaned_nk, correct_artifacts=True, method
    ='neurokit')
assert signals.shape == (120000, 1)
assert np.allclose(signals['ECG_R_Peaks'].values.sum(dtype=np.int64), 139,
    atol=1)
